flex2.tools.oem.internal

Class OEMConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • flex2.compiler.util.AbstractLogger
      • flex2.compiler.util.ConsoleLogger
        • flex2.tools.oem.internal.OEMConsole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logger

    public class OEMConsole
extends ConsoleLogger
implements Logger
    An OEM API logger implementation that outputs using System.err and System.out.
    Version:
    2.0.1
    Author:
    Clement Wong

    • Method Detail

      • log

        public void log(Message message,
       int errorCode,
       String source)
        Description copied from interface: Logger
        Logs a compiler message.
        Parameters:
        message - An object that implements the flex2.tools.oem.Message interface.
        errorCode - Error code. -1 if an error code is not available.
        source - Source code line number specified by the message.getLine() method. null if the compiler message is not associated with any source file.
